biotools.summary: The tool takes a digital mammogram and performs an automatic segmentation of the breast area and the dense tissue. After the mammogram segmentation, the tool returns a DICOM-SEG image with both the dense tissue and the breast tissue mask combined.

bioschemas.name: Breast Dense Tissue Segmentation
bioschemas.summary: The tool takes a digital mammogram and performs an automatic segmentation of the breast area and the dense tissue. After the mammogram segmentation, the tool returns a DICOM-SEG image with both the dense tissue and the breast tissue mask combined.
